about_the_game:
Hero Mania is a bombastic, comic-book themed multiplayer party game where players step into the sparkling spandex of unfamed, super-powered heroes in an all-out brawl to win fame and glory -- oh, and to save the city of course!


Fight Crime!
Help citizens, and take down criminals!




Battle Using Incredibly Bizarre Super Powers!
Choose from a roster of bizarre, silly, and unacclaimed heroes each with their own oddball personalities and powers.




Throw Your Friends!
Use the environment -- and each other -- to get the upper hand in a fight!




Become the City's Number One Hero!
Blast, dash, and smash your way to the top!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 6100 Integrated Graphics or Equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements are an estimation for achieving playable framerates on low settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Hero Mania is a bombastic, comic-book themed multiplayer party game where players don the spandex of unfamed, super-powered heroes as they brawl their way to the top using their abilities, wits, and even each other!
